mapper.select: SELECT @rowid:=@rowid+1 as id , d.dic_value as title, count(1) as col_value FROM business_custom b, (SELECT @rowid:=0) as init, business_dictionary d where b.state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.dic_name = 'CUSTOM-INDUSTRY' and d.dic_key = b.industry_type group by b.industry_type

SELECT @rowid:=@rowid+1 as id , DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date,'%Y%m') as title, count(1) as col_value FROM business_custom b, (SELECT @rowid:=0) as init where b.state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.create_date > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -12 MONTH) group by DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date,'%Y%m')

select @rowid:=@rowid + 1 as id, sum(b.s_u_nums) as title, sum(a.sc_u_nums) as col_value from business_server_cabinet a, business_server b, business_server_room c, (SELECT @rowid:=0) as init where a.sc_id = b.sc_id and a.sr_id = c.sr_id and c.sr_id = #{serverRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT @rowid:=@rowid + 1 as id, b.title as title, r1.total as col_value, r2.total as col_value_second FROM (SELECT @rowid:=0) as init, report_invest_src b left join report_investmonth r1 ON b.title = r1.title and r1.invest_type = 1 left join report_investmonth r2 ON b.title = r2.title and r2.invest_type = 2 order by b.title

SELECT @rowid:=@rowid + 1 as id, b.title as title, r1.col_value_second as col_value, r2.col_value_second as col_value_second FROM (SELECT @rowid:=0) as init, report_complaint_src b left join report_complaint_month r1 ON b.title = r1.title and r1.col_value = 1 left join report_complaint_month r2 ON b.title = r2.title and r2.col_value = 2 order by b.title
select @rowid:=@rowid + 1 as id, ss.realname as title, ss.price as col_value, ss.sum_charged as col_value_second from report_order_month ss, (SELECT @rowid:=0) as init order by ss.price desc
